input.sentences: there is a big party tonight and i am really excited to be invited
we are having an awesome time with our friends at the party tonight .
i think this party is getting out of hand . i am starting to act silly .
who left their beer bottle on the stove ? this party is out of control
my friend had too much to drink tonight . she is acting crazy .
output.sentences: Tonight I got invited to a dorm party.
"It's time to go to the party," said my roommate, Lars, like I didn't know it was tonight.
He's starting early tonight, sporting his silly side early.
The last time he was like this he left the stove on, took off to a party and then nearly burnt the place down.
I checked the stove, brought my teetoling friend to get me home safe, and hit the bar, cause tonight I carouse and drink to my heart's content.
